name: pat-cloud-storage
description: A modern, secure cloud storage solution

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run build:shared" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd shared && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:shared && npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend

author: Pat
